ygData.subject: Re: Languages
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I think they will show up when your skill improves in these languages. Also, after they improve some more you will see them show up in the language
ygData.messageBody:
> I spent one training point on the languages Dwarven, Gnoll,
> and Erudian (sp)
> when at the Academy of Sciences in Freeport but these
> languages do not show
> up in my skills when training at other trainers, and they
> also are not
> available as languages in my chat window. Anyone have any
> idea why? Also
> assuming I figure out how this can be fixed how can I
> improve my skill in
> these easiest.

I think they will show up when your skill improves in these languages.
Also, after they improve some more you will see them show up in the
language selection box, so you can practice speaking them yourself. I
have no idea how long this takes.

Aznyin
